Miniconda3
==========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Miniconda3 installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Miniconda3, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Miniconda3/23.10.0-1
```
